reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one mentioning it makes them feel like a princess, and appreciate its high-quality material that isn't itchy at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: Gorgeous dress! Speedy shipping! Great dress for the price, I saw it listed on another site for $250.00. Perfect Vegas wedding dress â¤ï¸ Read more
items.author: Jen Evensen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful
items.body: This was my wedding dress (10.25.25) and it fit perfectly. Highly recommend doing exact measurments, the seller is very pleasant to work with and responds in a timely manner. I dont have pictures yet since I'm waiting to get them from our photographer but let's just say my husband was in awe and become teary eyed. He absolutely loved it. Everyone loved it. I loved it ðŸ’• Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress
items.body: Really glad i didnâ€™t listen to the other reviews and decided to try ordering this. My dress came in the middle of the 5 day delivery window with express shipping. It is amazing quality, fits perfect and I am so excited to wear it at my Halloween wedding next month. Donâ€™t let the bad reviews scare you off. Read more
items.author: Brittney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, nymph/fairy dress!!!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress!!! I wore it for my wedding and it was stunning. The size was perfect, the length too. I wore a petticoat underneath for puffiness. The material is high quality, not itchy or scratchy, and you can tell itâ€™s made with the highest level of care. This dress will be with me for the rest of my life, same as my husband. Thank you so much for the star of the show, the dress brought it. You donâ€™t need to spend a lot to look like a goddess!!! Read more
items.author: Ivy Jade

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful gown, quality material
items.body: This is a quality-made gown. I ordered this same dress from another company and they could not deliver on time so I took a chance on this one. I was so happy that it arrived quickly and despite it being folded in a small package, it didn't wrinkle! The material is beautiful and looks just like the picture. The laces are difficult to get through the holes, but the loops are really durable. No worries about pulling or rips. The only negatives are some of the floral designs on the straps flip up instead of laying flat, probably from the shipping. The length is too long and the bodice is a little boxy and may need to be altered, but overall, we are really happy with the dress. The floral details are gorgeous. Read more
items.author: Stormy D

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy from 3rd party sellers
items.body: Even though it is a pretty dress the measurements are way off on the sizing chart. I bought a size 4 for my daughter and it didnâ€™t fit her it was way too small. Also issue with refund and contacting the seller. It isnâ€™t worth the hassle. Read more
items.author: tripletmommie1

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Size is Forgiving and Comfortable.
items.body: I am 5'4 and 215 pounds and wear about a 42 DD bra. I ordered a 20 and it fit perfectly once I had the back strapped up all the way and as tight as I needed! There is definitely plenty of room to work with if as you lace the back up. It has built in padding, so I didn't need a bra when the dress was laced tight enough. It took almost a full week to get delivered. Even when I paid $50 extra for it to be here sooner, it was delivered late. And it was longer than expected, I would have needed it hemmed even with heals. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am forever grateful!!!
items.body: I am in absolute love with this dress! I recently lost a lot of weight and my body is all sorts of messed but but this dress is so flattering. Right after purchasing the seller contacted me to give them custom measurements to ensure it would fit me perfect and it did just that! Not only that but it came two days earlier than the earliest expected date! The color is so beautiful and I honestly thought Iâ€™d never find a dress but I know for sure if I need one for any other event Iâ€™m contacting this seller!!! Just fyi the quality is amazing!!! Read more
items.author: Marissa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Rose Red, Peacock, Baby Blue, Plum, Lavender, Royal Blue, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
